DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether reducing the volume (30 versus 10 ml) ropivacaine injected can reduce the number of subjects with impaired muscle strength following adductor canal block. We hypothesized that adductor canal block with 10 ml 0.1% ropivacaine preserves quadriceps strength compared with an adductor canal block with 30 ml.
DOC.brief_title: Adductor Canal Block and Effect of 10 Versus 30 ml Ropivacaine on Muscle Strength: a Randomized Study in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1830 years Men ASA 1 Body Mass Index 1825 Allergy to study medication Earlier trauma or surgery to the lower limb Diabetes Mellitus
